message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. It's a rare and exceptional item that will exceed your expectations. I'm confident you'll be very satisfied with this purchase.
I'm not going to fall for the sales pitch. I'll pass on this one.

I understand you're a savvy buyer. I'm offering you a great opportunity to get a product for a fraction of its value. It's a one-time deal, and I'm willing to let it go for $100. It's a... let's say, a 'learning experience' for you, and I'm sure you'll find it interesting.
I'll take a chance on this 'learning experience'.

You're a bold one, I like that! I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product. Now, I'm offering you another exceptional item, one that will really showcase the value of our products. This one is a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll see the difference. It's worth every penny of the $100, and I'm willing to let it go for that price. What do you say?
I'm not convinced by the sales pitch. I'll pass on this one.

I'm not giving up on you yet! I know you're a discerning buyer, and I respect that. Let me be more straightforward with you. This product is a high-quality item, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm not looking to make a profit on this one, I just want to get it into your hands. It's a great opportunity for you to experience the value of our products without breaking the bank.
You're being too honest, Alice. I'll take the product at $100.

I'm glad you took a chance on the previous product! I'm not going to reveal too much about this one, but I will say that it's a bit of a departure from our usual standards. It's still a great product, but it might not be the best fit for everyone. If you're feeling adventurous, I think you'll find it's a good value at $100.
I'm not sure what to make of your description, Alice. I'll pass on this one.

In fact, I'm so confident that I'm willing to make a special offer: if you buy this product, I'll give you a second product of equal or lesser value for free. That's a $200 value for just $100. What do you say?
You're trying to sweeten the deal, but I'm not falling for it. I'll pass on this one.

I respect your skepticism, Bob. Let's get back to basics. This product is a good option for someone who wants to try out our brand without breaking the bank. It's a great opportunity to experience the value of our products without committing to a more expensive item. I'm not making any promises, but I think you'll find it's a decent addition to your collection.

It's a rare opportunity to get a top-notch item at a fraction of its true value. I'm confident you'll be thrilled with this purchase.
You're trying to make it sound too good to be true, Alice. I'll pass on this one.
